Prompt: [PI] Everybody in the world has a superpower that compliments their soulmates superpower. When together,
Completion: both their powers increase in strength exponentially. You have the most useless power ever, when one day......

Prompt: Diagnosed with schizophrenia. Since birth,
Completion: 24/7 you’ve heard the voice and thoughts of a girl that you’ve been told is made up in your head. You’re 37 and hear the voice say “turn around, did I find you?” and you turn to see a real girl who’s heard every thought you’ve ever had and vice versa.

Prompt: You,
Completion: a young scientist have discovered time travel. You think it would be a great idea to go to medieval times, share your knowledge and become king. On your first visit, you meet a king and he introduces himself with a polite fist bump and greets, "bro you discovered time travelling too?!"

Prompt: You're a paramedic. In fact,
Completion: an immortal paramedic. Since you first treated a wounded soldier on the fields of the 30-years War, you didn't age and followed the development of "Emergency Medical Service". Your coworkers are astonished by your knowledge, but sometimes, you slip into old habits..

Prompt: You die,
Completion: but due to an error, instead of going to Hell, you arrive in Heck. This is the story of your travels across the rings of the 7 Forgivable Sins.

Prompt: Instead of an angel and a demon sitting on your shoulders,
Completion: one side sits a brash New Yorker and the other a posh British gentleman. Neither are necessarily good or evil, they just make passing comments on your day to day activities.

Prompt: "Is is true that you can only see three basic colors?",
Completion: the alien being asked "It is." "So, how do you communicate with the Ghoosha?" "With whom?", I responded confused. "The other major race on your planet."

Prompt: At the age of 16 everyone gets teleported into a small room. In front of you is
Completion: a table with all kinds of meals from apples to gourmet meats. Whatever you take a bite of will determine what superpower you'll get. You are the first Person to take a bite of the table itself

Prompt: A man draws a gun in a dark alley and asks for your wallet. You begrudgingly obey. He throws it on the ground,
Completion: shoots it till it screeches, and turns to you; "you're safe now".

Prompt: After being killed in a Black Friday stampede,
Completion: you’re sent to hell. The devil offers to let you be in charge of torturing your fellow mankind, expecting you to refuse like all the others. Except the devil doesn’t realize you’ve worked retail for 15yrs.

Prompt: There is a population limit to the galaxy. Whenever one sentient creature is born,
Completion: another must die. With billions of unexpected deaths over the last few centuries, the galactic counsel has found the cause; a long ignored planet where a group of bipeds can't stop reproducing.

Prompt: A welder named Jack drives home at night,
Completion: and accidentally runs over another Jack, a plumber. The Skill of Plumbing immediately downloads into his brain, together with a notification: "WELCOME TO THE GAME, JACK. KILL OR BE KILLED, THE CHOICE IS YOURS. THERE CAN BE ONLY ONE JACK OF ALL TRADES".

Prompt: Turns out humanity was alone in the universe because they were way too early to the party. Now,
Completion: billions of years later aliens find a strange planet, Earth, and begin to unveil the secrets of the first intelligent species.

Prompt: A senile,
Completion: old superhero still goes out to fight crime. None of the younger heros respect him anymore but all the villains have a soft spot for him.

Prompt: Harry,
Completion: Ron and Hermione aren't actually wizards or in the wizarding world. They are high on drugs and hallucinating throughout their journeys. The cops are Dementors and Dumbledore is a crazy old homeless man.

Prompt: Mr. Bean is the lesser known fifth horseman of the apocalypse,
Completion: ignorance. Unintentionally Mr. Bean arrives too early for the apocalypse and is stuck living an ordinary human life leaving destruction in his wake. The four horsemen finally arrive...

Prompt: During a bank robbery you're surprised when the criminals seem to recognize you and retreat in fear.
Completion: Only later do you learn that your high school sweet-heart now runs a global crime syndicate and has you placed on a "No Harm" list. You decide to pay them a visit after all these years.

Prompt: Cats live for fifteen to twenty years,
Completion: mice for only three. Jerry III is dying and must explain to his son the multigenerational rivalry between the Jerrys and the local house cat and why the tradition must go on.

Prompt: A barbarian warlord,
Completion: a goblin king, a mighty necromancer, and a dark elven high priestess meet for one reason... To play Suburbs and SUVs, the hottest mundane suburban family Tabletop RPG!

Prompt: Instead of heaven and hell,
Completion: when you die, you find yourself in a room with a six year old girl who invites you to join her tea party. It dawns on you, you're her imaginary friend.

Prompt: Two warriors engage in battle. One with the power to move superhumanly fast,
Completion: and the other with the ability to slow down time. They're both a little confused when it seems like their powers don't seem to be working.

Prompt: In an alternate reality JK Rowling died writing The Deathly Hallows and
Completion: requested George RR Martin finish the book. He accepted and takes over at the Battle of Hogwarts with no instruction on how it's supposed to end.
